About

I am an explorer, ready to dabble in anything I find fascinating and rewarding. Passionate about programming, I am equally comfortable with leadership roles. I enjoy experimenting with new development

tools and I keep myself up-to-date with the latest in the world of technology. I have been developing Android apps for the past 2 years.

Portfolio
Certified Android Developer from NPTEL

"Smartphones have emerged as the ubiquitous computing platform. It is expected that by 2020, almost 70% of population will own a smartphone. Android is an open source platform & one of the fastest growing platforms in computing today with 1.4B active users worldwide. In this course, you will learn Android Programming to create applications for smartphones. You will also learn integration of mobile applications with cloud services to create mobile-cloud applications."

iMoon

The National Institute of Ocean Technology, Velachery is an autonomous body under Ministry of Earth Sciences, Govt. of India. NIOT collects data from buoys deployed across Indian Ocean, Bay of Bengal and Arabian Sea under the Ocean Observation Network (OON) programme. iMoon serves as an easy-to-use front-end mobile application for accessing this data.

SRM Desk

Desk is SRM University's Official Student-Teacher Interaction App.

Aaruush '16

The official app for Aaruush 2016, the annual technical fest of SRM University, Kattankulathur

Blaze

A sample app which implements a couple of Firebase SDK functionalities:

  • Authenticate and Sign-in using Google Sign-In
  • Upload Files to Firebase Storage
  • Retrieve files from Storage using download links stored in Firebase Database
  • Receive notification on all signed-in devices when upload is made from any one of them (using same account)





    • Mozzo

    Worked as an intern at Mozzobytes, on the their food ordering android app "Mozzo". I worked on improving multiple aspects of the app, while gaining experience in building android apps using Kotlin.

    Winuall

    Worked as an intern for Winuall, a Kota-based company handling their eponymous education app. The app is used by students preparing for JEE to ask doubts.
